summary: Website project with subscription plans and payment flow. User wants to remove the admin panel from the website.

existing_features.title: Remove the admin panel button from the student Dashboard page (DashboardPage.tsx) so it is no longer visible or accessible to any user.
Remove the admin dropdown menu from the Header component (Header.tsx) so admin navigation links are not shown in the top navigation bar.

Remove the admin routes (/admin, /admin/dashboard, /admin/content, /admin/users, and any other /admin/* routes) from the TanStack Router configuration in App.tsx so admin pages are not reachable via URL.
Remove the admin panel link/button from the Login page (LoginPage.tsx) so that after login, admin users are not redirected to the admin panel.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove admin panel from the website
